comments.body: Nice catch adding `get_network` as well as `get_network_id`.

That's what I was fixing as part of fixing the validate-modules sanity issues.

These were known issues that we simply ignored because nobody took the time to look into them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@    type: str
    required: true
    choices: [add_network, delete_network, get_network, get_network_id, release_ip, release_network, reserve_network, reserve_next_available_ip ]
  network_id:
    description:
